visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render an area chart with the title 'Legend symbol options'. The chart should have three data series: 'areaMarker (default)', 'lineMarker', and 'rectangle *'. Each series should have its own data points. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors for the series and include other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.

caption.text: *) Rectangle appears as a circle because of the default legend.symbolRadius.

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render an area chart with the specified title 'Legend symbol options'. The chart includes three data series: 'areaMarker (default)', 'lineMarker', and 'rectangle *', each with its own set of data points. The axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. Custom colors are applied to each series to differentiate them visually. Additional configurations include settings for the chart's background color, margins, and legend, ensuring a well-organized and visually appealing chart layout.
